description:
Zebar creates cross-platform taskbars, desktop widgets, and popups.

Zebar is a tool for creating customizable and cross-platform taskbars, desktop widgets, and popups.
** Will write some better descriptions of the changes tomorrow morning.ðŸŽ‰ New features
- Add "Edit" system tray option for linking directly to widget config form (#163).
- Add all active sessions and media control functions to media provider (#158).
- Add audio provider (#154).
- Add binding mode toggle to example glazewm config (#155).
- Add config path to widget window title (#164).
- Add count of how many widgets are open to settings UI sidebar.
- Add recording devices and setVolume to audio provider (#170).
- Allow widget window title to be set via tauri window API.
- Export startWidget for programmatically launching widget at given placement.
- Expose current window as currentWidget().window.
- Expose whether WM is paused in glazewm provider (#167).
- Prevent duplicate emissions for keyboard + media providers (#162).
- Rename start-preset -> start-widget-preset.
- Setup for provider functions (#156).
